Pearson will donate £150,000 ($180,000 USD) to the International Rescue Committee to support immediate humanitarian relief efforts in Turkey and Syria.

PepsiCo and the PepsiCo Foundation are mobilizing quickly to provide USD $1.2 million, inclusive of employee donation matching, in humanitarian aid to Türkiye and Syria where the thousands impacted are facing sub-zero temperatures.
By making a donation of one million euros, Porsche AG is supporting Germany’s relief coalition Aktion Deutschland Hilft e.V. in its work in the flood-stricken areas.
$1 million to the Korean Red Cross to support emergency relief efforts in Turkey after a massive earthquake hit the country.

Ripple will first donate $250,000 in XRP tokens. The company will also match all crypto donations 2:1 up to $750,000 USD. Any unmet match amount will be donated.
